titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Remembering Bishop : favorite songs of Bishop David L. Ellis Sr [sound recording] / Greater Grace Temple.

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: Remembering Bishop : favorite songs of Bishop David L. Ellis Sr [sound recording] / Greater Grace Temple.

odd.head: Formatted Contents Note
odd.p: 1. Down through the years -- 2. Enjoying Jesus Hallelujah -- 3. Yield not to temptation -- 4. Bless that wonderful name -- 5. The Lord will make a way somehow -- 6. Jesus keep me near the cross -- 7. God has smiled on me -- 8. Hallelujah Jesus saves -- 9. Yes Lord -- 10. I'm so glad to be in the number -- 11. I don't know what you come to do -- 12. I'll fly away -- 13. Don't forget to remember -- 14. I want to be a follower of Christ -- 15. Blessed assurance -- 16. Great is thy faithfulness -- 17. He'll never let you down -- 18. Hallelujah.

odd.head: Series Statement
odd.p: Favorite songs of Bishop David L. Ellis Sr. ; v. 2
